Uses of Class
com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.DiscoveryFilter

Packages that use DiscoveryFilter
com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core The IBM Deployment Modeling Platform provides models and tooling elements to construct validatable metamodels of the Topology Definition Model (TDM). 
com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core.provider.discovery Topology Discoverer Service Documentation 
 

Uses of DiscoveryFilter in com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core
 

Methods in com.ibm.ccl.soa.deploy.core with parameters of type DiscoveryFilter
abstract  boolean UnitDiscoverer.canDiscover(DiscoveryFilter filter)
          This implementation of this method should specify whether the discovery provider is capable of serving the request based on the contents set in the filter.

static boolean DiscoveryFilterFactory.isFindGroupsFilter(DiscoveryFilter filter)
          Determine if a filter is for following existing member links (from a member to group elements).It is expected that: useExistingMember == true unit is not null requirements is non-empty the interpreter on the requirements is InCardinality
